sqlMap.select: SELECT A.BRANCHID, A.PAYEEACC, A.BENNAME, A.BENIDN, A.PAYAMT, A.DLINEDATE, A.PAYDATE, A.PAYTYP, A.CPRNDATE FROM BAPAYRPTRECORD A WHERE A.RPTTYP = '2' AND A.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND SUBSTR(A.APNO, 1, 1) = #payCode:VARCHAR# AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# ORDER BY A.BRANCHID

SELECT A.BRANCHID, A.PAYEEACC, A.BENNAME, A.BENIDN, A.PAYAMT, A.DLINEDATE, A.PAYDATE, A.PAYTYP, A.CPRNDATE FROM BAPAYRPTRECORD A WHERE A.RPTTYP = '2' AND A.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND SUBSTR(A.APNO, 1, 1) = #payCode:VARCHAR# AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR#
AND 1 = 0
A.PAYSEQNO = #paySeqNo:VARCHAR#
ORDER BY A.BRANCHID

SELECT A.BRANCHID, A.PAYEEACC, A.BENNAME, A.BENIDN, A.PAYAMT, A.DLINEDATE, A.PAYDATE, A.PAYTYP, A.CPRNDATE FROM BAPAYRPTRECORD A WHERE A.RPTTYP = '2' AND A.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND SUBSTR(A.APNO, 1, 1) = #payCode:VARCHAR# AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# ORDER BY A.BRANCHID

SELECT A.APNO, A.PAYBANKID, A.BRANCHID, A.PAYEEACC, (nvl(PAYBANKID,' ')||deCode(nvl(BRANCHID,' '),' ',deCode(nvl(PAYEEACC,' '),' ','','-'),'-')|| nvl(BRANCHID,' ')||deCode(nvl(BRANCHID,' '),' ',deCode(nvl(PAYEEACC,' '),' ','','-'),'-')|| PAYEEACC) AS ACCOUNTNO, A.ISSUYM, A.PAYYM, A.BENIDN, A.BENNAME, NVL(A.PAYAMT, 0) AS PAYAMT, A.CHKDATE, A.PAYDATE, A.PAYTYP, A.RPTPAGE, A.BENEVTREL, A.COMPNAME1, B.PARAMNAME AS PAYTYPNAME, A.COMPNAME2, A.CPRNDATE FROM BAPAYRPTRECORD A, BAPARAM B WHERE A.RPTTYP = '3' AND A.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND SUBSTR(A.APNO, 1, 1) = #payCode:VARCHAR# AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# AND A.PAYTYP = B.PARAMCODE (+) AND A.PAYTYP <> '4' AND B.PARAMGROUP (+) = 'PAYTYPE' AND B.PARAMUSEMK (+) = 'Y'
AND 1 = 0
BENEVTREL = #benEvtRel:VARCHAR#
(
BENEVTREL in
BENEVTREL not in
#benEvtRel[]#
OR TRIM(BENEVTREL) IS NULL )
ORDER BY
#orderBy[]#

SELECT A.APNO, A.PAYBANKID, A.BRANCHID, A.PAYEEACC, (nvl(PAYBANKID,' ')||deCode(nvl(BRANCHID,' '),' ',deCode(nvl(PAYEEACC,' '),' ','','-'),'-')|| nvl(BRANCHID,' ')||deCode(nvl(BRANCHID,' '),' ',deCode(nvl(PAYEEACC,' '),' ','','-'),'-')|| PAYEEACC) AS ACCOUNTNO, A.ISSUYM, A.PAYYM, A.BENIDN, A.BENNAME, NVL(A.PAYAMT, 0) AS PAYAMT, A.CHKDATE, A.PAYDATE, A.PAYTYP, A.RPTPAGE, A.BENEVTREL, A.COMPNAME1, B.PARAMNAME AS PAYTYPNAME, A.COMPNAME2, A.CPRNDATE FROM BAPAYRPTRECORD A, BAPARAM B WHERE A.RPTTYP = '3' AND A.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND SUBSTR(A.APNO, 1, 1) = #payCode:VARCHAR# AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# AND A.PAYTYP = B.PARAMCODE (+) AND A.PAYTYP <> '4' AND B.PARAMGROUP (+) = 'PAYTYPE' AND B.PARAMUSEMK (+) = 'Y'
AND 1 = 0
A.PAYSEQNO = #paySeqNo:VARCHAR#
ORDER BY A.PAYTYP, A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.ISSUYM, A.PAYYM

SELECT A.APNO, A.PAYBANKID, A.BRANCHID, A.PAYEEACC, (nvl(PAYBANKID,' ')||deCode(nvl(BRANCHID,' '),' ',deCode(nvl(PAYEEACC,' '),' ','','-'),'-')|| nvl(BRANCHID,' ')||deCode(nvl(BRANCHID,' '),' ',deCode(nvl(PAYEEACC,' '),' ','','-'),'-')|| PAYEEACC) AS ACCOUNTNO, A.ISSUYM, A.PAYYM, A.BENIDN, A.BENNAME, NVL(A.PAYAMT, 0) AS PAYAMT, A.CHKDATE, A.PAYDATE, A.PAYTYP, A.RPTPAGE, A.BENEVTREL, A.COMPNAME1, B.PARAMNAME AS PAYTYPNAME, A.COMPNAME2, A.CPRNDATE FROM BAPAYRPTRECORD A, BAPARAM B WHERE A.RPTTYP = '3' AND A.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND SUBSTR(A.APNO, 1, 1) = #payCode:VARCHAR# AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# AND A.PAYTYP = B.PARAMCODE (+) AND A.PAYTYP <> '4' AND B.PARAMGROUP (+) = 'PAYTYPE' AND B.PARAMUSEMK (+) = 'Y' ORDER BY A.PAYTYP, A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.ISSUYM, A.PAYYM

SELECT COMPNAME1, NVL(SUM(PAYAMT),0) AS PAYAMT FROM BAPAYRPTRECORD WHERE RPTTYP = '3' AND BENEVTREL = 'Z' AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# AND SUBSTR(APNO, 1, 1) = #payCode:VARCHAR# GROUP BY BENEVTREL, PAYTYP, COMPNAME1, ISSUYM

SELECT A.PAYBANKID, A.BRANCHID, A.PAYEEACC, A.BENNAME, NVL(A.PAYAMT, 0) AS PAYAMT, A.APNO, A.ISSUYM, A.PAYYM, A.BENIDN, A.PAYDATE, A.BENEVTREL, A.COMPNAME1, A.COMPNAME2, A.PAYTYP, A.CPRNDATE FROM BAPAYRPTRECORD A WHERE A.RPTTYP = '4' AND A.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# AND SUBSTR(A.APNO, 1, 1) = #payCode:VARCHAR#
AND 1 = 0
BENEVTREL = #benEvtRel:VARCHAR#
(
BENEVTREL in
BENEVTREL not in
#benEvtRel[]#
OR TRIM(BENEVTREL) IS NULL )
ORDER BY
#orderBy[]#

SELECT A.PAYBANKID, A.BRANCHID, A.PAYEEACC, A.BENNAME, NVL(A.PAYAMT, 0) AS PAYAMT, A.APNO, A.ISSUYM, A.PAYYM, A.BENIDN, A.PAYDATE, A.BENEVTREL, A.COMPNAME1, A.COMPNAME2, A.PAYTYP, A.CPRNDATE FROM BAPAYRPTRECORD A WHERE A.RPTTYP = '4' AND A.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND A.CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# AND SUBSTR(A.APNO, 1, 1) = #payCode:VARCHAR#
AND 1 = 0
A.PAYSEQNO = #paySeqNo:VARCHAR#
ORDER BY A.PAYTYP, A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.ISSUYM, A.PAYYM

SELECT A.PAYBANKID, A.BRANCHID, A.PAYEEACC, A.BENNAME, NVL(A.PAYAMT, 0) AS PAYAMT, A.APNO, A.ISSUYM, A.PAYYM, A.BENIDN, A.PAYDATE, A.BENEVTREL, A.COMPNAME1, A.COMPNAME2, A.PAYTYP, A.CPRNDATE FROM BAPAYRPTRECORD A WHERE A.RPTTYP = '4' AND A.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# AND SUBSTR(A.APNO, 1, 1) = #payCode:VARCHAR# ORDER BY A.PAYTYP, A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.ISSUYM, A.PAYYM

SELECT COMPNAME1, NVL(SUM(PAYAMT),0) AS PAYAMT FROM BAPAYRPTRECORD WHERE RPTTYP = '4' AND BENEVTREL = 'Z' AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# AND SUBSTR(APNO, 1, 1) = #payCode:VARCHAR# GROUP BY BENEVTREL, COMPNAME1, ISSUYM

SELECT A.APNO ,(nvl(A.PAYBANKID,' ')||deCode(nvl(A.BRANCHID,' '),' ',deCode(nvl(A.PAYEEACC,' '),' ','','-'),'-')|| nvl(A.BRANCHID,' ')||deCode(nvl(A.BRANCHID,' '),' ',deCode(nvl(A.PAYEEACC,' '),' ','','-'),'-')|| A.PAYEEACC) AS ACCOUNTNO ,A.ISSUYM ,A.PAYYM ,A.BENIDN ,A.BENNAME ,NVL(A.PAYAMT, 0) AS PAYAMT ,A.CHKDATE ,A.PAYDATE ,A.PAYTYP ,'' AS PAYTYPNAME ,A.RPTPAGE ,A.BENEVTREL ,A.COMPNAME1 ,A.COMPNAME2 ,B.COMMZIP ,B.COMMADDR ,A.CPRNDATE FROM BAPAYRPTRECORD A,BAAPPBASE B WHERE A.APNO = B.APNO AND A.SEQNO = B.SEQNO AND A.RPTTYP = '3' AND A.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND SUBSTR(A.APNO, 1, 1) = #payCode:VARCHAR# AND A.CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# AND A.PAYTYP = '4'
AND 1 = 0
A.BENEVTREL = #benEvtRel:VARCHAR#
(
A.BENEVTREL in
A.BENEVTREL not in
#benEvtRel[]#
OR TRIM(A.BENEVTREL) IS NULL )
ORDER BY
#orderBy[]#

SELECT A.APNO ,(nvl(A.PAYBANKID,' ')||deCode(nvl(A.BRANCHID,' '),' ',deCode(nvl(A.PAYEEACC,' '),' ','','-'),'-')|| nvl(A.BRANCHID,' ')||deCode(nvl(A.BRANCHID,' '),' ',deCode(nvl(A.PAYEEACC,' '),' ','','-'),'-')|| A.PAYEEACC) AS ACCOUNTNO ,A.ISSUYM ,A.PAYYM ,A.BENIDN ,A.BENNAME ,NVL(A.PAYAMT, 0) AS PAYAMT ,A.CHKDATE ,A.PAYDATE ,A.PAYTYP ,'' AS PAYTYPNAME ,A.RPTPAGE ,A.BENEVTREL ,A.COMPNAME1 ,A.COMPNAME2 ,B.COMMZIP ,B.COMMADDR ,A.CPRNDATE FROM BAPAYRPTRECORD A,BAAPPBASE B WHERE A.APNO = B.APNO AND A.SEQNO = B.SEQNO AND A.PAYKIND = B.PAYKIND AND A.RPTTYP = '3' AND A.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND SUBSTR(A.APNO, 1, 1) = #payCode:VARCHAR# AND A.CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# AND A.PAYTYP = '4'
AND 1 = 0
A.PAYSEQNO = #paySeqNo:VARCHAR#
UNION
SELECT A.APNO ,(nvl(A.PAYBANKID,' ')||deCode(nvl(A.BRANCHID,' '),' ',deCode(nvl(A.PAYEEACC,' '),' ','','-'),'-')|| nvl(A.BRANCHID,' ')||deCode(nvl(A.BRANCHID,' '),' ',deCode(nvl(A.PAYEEACC,' '),' ','','-'),'-')|| A.PAYEEACC) AS ACCOUNTNO ,A.ISSUYM ,A.PAYYM ,A.BENIDN ,A.BENNAME ,NVL(A.PAYAMT, 0) AS PAYAMT ,A.CHKDATE ,A.PAYDATE ,A.PAYTYP ,'' AS PAYTYPNAME ,A.RPTPAGE ,A.BENEVTREL ,A.COMPNAME1 ,A.COMPNAME2 ,B.COMMZIP ,B.COMMADDR ,A.CPRNDATE FROM BAPAYRPTRECORD A,BAAPPBASE B WHERE A.APNO = B.APNO AND A.SEQNO = B.SEQNO AND B.PAYKIND = '37' AND A.RPTTYP = '3' AND A.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND SUBSTR(A.APNO, 1, 1) =#payCode:VARCHAR# AND A.CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# AND A.PAYTYP = '4'
AND 1 = 0
A.PAYSEQNO = #paySeqNo:VARCHAR#

SELECT A.APNO ,(nvl(A.PAYBANKID,' ')||deCode(nvl(A.BRANCHID,' '),' ',deCode(nvl(A.PAYEEACC,' '),' ','','-'),'-')|| nvl(A.BRANCHID,' ')||deCode(nvl(A.BRANCHID,' '),' ',deCode(nvl(A.PAYEEACC,' '),' ','','-'),'-')|| A.PAYEEACC) AS ACCOUNTNO ,A.ISSUYM ,A.PAYYM ,A.BENIDN ,A.BENNAME ,NVL(A.PAYAMT, 0) AS PAYAMT ,A.CHKDATE ,A.PAYDATE ,A.PAYTYP ,'' AS PAYTYPNAME ,A.RPTPAGE ,A.BENEVTREL ,A.COMPNAME1 ,A.COMPNAME2 ,B.COMMZIP ,B.COMMADDR ,A.CPRNDATE FROM BAPAYRPTRECORD A,BAAPPBASE B WHERE A.APNO = B.APNO AND A.SEQNO = B.SEQNO AND A.RPTTYP = '3' AND A.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND SUBSTR(A.APNO, 1, 1) = #payCode:VARCHAR# AND A.CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# AND A.PAYTYP = '4' ORDER BY A.PAYTYP, A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.ISSUYM, A.PAYYM

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT APNO) AS APNOAMT ,COUNT(*) AS DATAAMT ,NVL(SUM(ISSUEAMT),0) AS ISSUEAMT ,NVL(SUM(OTHERAAMT),0) AS OTHERAAMT ,NVL(SUM(OTHERBAMT),0) AS OTHERBAMT ,NVL(SUM(MITRATE),0) AS MITRATE ,NVL(SUM(OFFSETAMT),0) AS OFFSETAMT ,NVL(SUM(COMPENAMT),0) AS COMPENAMT ,NVL(SUM(INHERITORAMT),0) AS INHERITORAMT ,NVL(SUM(ITRTTAX),0) AS ITRTTAX ,NVL(SUM(OTHERAMT),0) AS OTHERAMT ,ISSUTYP ,PAYTYP ,CHKDATE FROM BAPAYRPTRECORD WHERE RPTTYP = '1' AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND APNO LIKE #payCode:VARCHAR#||'%' AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR#
AND 1 = 0
BENEVTREL = #benEvtRel:VARCHAR#
BENEVTREL in
BENEVTREL not in
#benEvtRel[]#
GROUP BY PAYTYP,ISSUTYP,CHKDATE ORDER BY PAYTYP,ISSUTYP,CHKDATE

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT APNO) AS APNOAMT ,COUNT(*) AS DATAAMT ,NVL(SUM(ISSUEAMT),0) AS ISSUEAMT ,NVL(SUM(OTHERAAMT),0) AS OTHERAAMT ,NVL(SUM(OTHERBAMT),0) AS OTHERBAMT ,NVL(SUM(MITRATE),0) AS MITRATE ,NVL(SUM(OFFSETAMT),0) AS OFFSETAMT ,NVL(SUM(COMPENAMT),0) AS COMPENAMT ,NVL(SUM(INHERITORAMT),0) AS INHERITORAMT ,NVL(SUM(ITRTTAX),0) AS ITRTTAX ,NVL(SUM(OTHERAMT),0) AS OTHERAMT ,ISSUTYP ,PAYTYP ,CHKDATE FROM BAPAYRPTRECORD WHERE RPTTYP = '1' AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND APNO LIKE #payCode:VARCHAR#||'%' AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR#
AND 1 = 0
BENEVTREL = #benEvtRel:VARCHAR#
BENEVTREL in
BENEVTREL not in
#benEvtRel[]#
GROUP BY PAYTYP,ISSUTYP,CHKDATE ORDER BY PAYTYP,ISSUTYP,CHKDATE

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT APNO) AS APNOAMT ,COUNT(*) AS DATAAMT ,NVL(SUM(ISSUEAMT),0) AS ISSUEAMT ,NVL(SUM(OTHERAAMT),0) AS OTHERAAMT ,NVL(SUM(OTHERBAMT),0) AS OTHERBAMT ,NVL(SUM(MITRATE),0) AS MITRATE ,NVL(SUM(OFFSETAMT),0) AS OFFSETAMT ,NVL(SUM(COMPENAMT),0) AS COMPENAMT ,NVL(SUM(INHERITORAMT),0) AS INHERITORAMT ,NVL(SUM(ITRTTAX),0) AS ITRTTAX ,NVL(SUM(OTHERAMT),0) AS OTHERAMT ,ISSUTYP ,PAYTYP ,CHKDATE FROM BAPAYRPTRECORD WHERE RPTTYP = '1' AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND APNO LIKE #payCode:VARCHAR#||'%' AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR#
AND 1 = 0
BENEVTREL = #benEvtRel:VARCHAR#
BENEVTREL in
BENEVTREL not in
#benEvtRel[]#
GROUP BY PAYTYP,ISSUTYP,CHKDATE ORDER BY PAYTYP,ISSUTYP,CHKDATE

SELECT DECODE(BENEVTREL, '1', NVL(SUM(COMPENAMT),0), 'Z', NVL(SUM(ISSUEAMT),0)) AS COMPENAMT ,COMPID1 ,COMPNAME1 FROM BAPAYRPTRECORD WHERE RPTTYP = '1' AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND APNO LIKE #payCode:VARCHAR#||'%' AND PAYTYP = #payTyp:VARCHAR# AND COMPID1 IS NOT NULL AND BENEVTREL = #benEvtRel:VARCHAR# GROUP BY COMPID1,COMPNAME1,BENEVTREL

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT APNO) AS APNOAMT ,COUNT(*) AS DATAAMT ,NVL(SUM(ISSUEAMT),0) AS ISSUEAMT ,NVL(SUM(OTHERAAMT),0) AS OTHERAAMT ,NVL(SUM(OTHERBAMT),0) AS OTHERBAMT ,NVL(SUM(MITRATE),0) AS MITRATE ,NVL(SUM(OFFSETAMT),0) AS OFFSETAMT ,NVL(SUM(COMPENAMT),0) AS COMPENAMT ,NVL(SUM(INHERITORAMT),0) AS INHERITORAMT ,NVL(SUM(ITRTTAX),0) AS ITRTTAX ,NVL(SUM(OTHERAMT),0) AS OTHERAMT ,ISSUTYP ,PAYTYP ,CHKDATE FROM BAPAYRPTRECORD WHERE RPTTYP = '5' AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND APNO LIKE #payCode:VARCHAR#||'%' AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# GROUP BY PAYTYP,ISSUTYP,CHKDATE ORDER BY PAYTYP,ISSUTYP,CHKDATE

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT APNO) AS APNOAMT ,COUNT(*) AS DATAAMT ,NVL(SUM(ISSUEAMT),0) AS ISSUEAMT ,NVL(SUM(OTHERAAMT),0) AS OTHERAAMT ,NVL(SUM(OTHERBAMT),0) AS OTHERBAMT ,NVL(SUM(MITRATE),0) AS MITRATE ,NVL(SUM(OFFSETAMT),0) AS OFFSETAMT ,NVL(SUM(COMPENAMT),0) AS COMPENAMT ,NVL(SUM(INHERITORAMT),0) AS INHERITORAMT ,NVL(SUM(ITRTTAX),0) AS ITRTTAX ,NVL(SUM(OTHERAMT),0) AS OTHERAMT ,ISSUTYP ,PAYTYP ,CHKDATE FROM BAPAYRPTRECORD WHERE RPTTYP = '6' AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND APNO LIKE #payCode:VARCHAR#||'%' AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# GROUP BY PAYTYP,ISSUTYP,CHKDATE ORDER BY PAYTYP,ISSUTYP,CHKDATE

SELECT APNO ,PAYYM ,BENIDN ,BENNAME ,PAYTYP ,NVL(ISSUEAMT,0) AS ISSUEAMT ,NVL(OTHERAAMT,0) AS OTHERAAMT ,NVL(OTHERBAMT,0) AS OTHERBAMT ,NVL(MITRATE,0) AS MITRATE ,NVL(OFFSETAMT,0) AS OFFSETAMT ,NVL(COMPENAMT,0) AS COMPENAMT ,NVL(INHERITORAMT,0) AS INHERITORAMT ,NVL(ITRTTAX,0) AS ITRTTAX ,NVL(OTHERAMT,0) AS OTHERAMT ,ISSUTYP ,deCode(PAYTYP,'A',BENIDN,PAYBANKID||'-'||BRANCHID||'-'||PAYEEACC) AS PAYACCOUNT ,NVL(PAYBANKID,'') AS PAYBANKID ,NVL(BRANCHID,'') AS BRANCHID ,NVL(PAYEEACC,'') AS PAYEEACC ,CPRNDATE FROM BAPAYRPTRECORD WHERE RPTTYP = '1' AND BENEVTREL NOT IN ('F','N','Z') AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND APNO LIKE #apNo:VARCHAR#||'%' AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# ORDER BY ISSUTYP,PAYTYP,PAYYM,APNO,SEQNO

SELECT APNO ,PAYYM ,BENIDN ,BENNAME ,PAYTYP ,NVL(ISSUEAMT,0) AS ISSUEAMT ,NVL(OTHERAAMT,0) AS OTHERAAMT ,NVL(OTHERBAMT,0) AS OTHERBAMT ,NVL(MITRATE,0) AS MITRATE ,NVL(OFFSETAMT,0) AS OFFSETAMT ,NVL(COMPENAMT,0) AS COMPENAMT ,NVL(INHERITORAMT,0) AS INHERITORAMT ,NVL(ITRTTAX,0) AS ITRTTAX ,NVL(OTHERAMT,0) AS OTHERAMT ,ISSUTYP ,deCode(PAYTYP,'A',BENIDN,PAYBANKID||'-'||BRANCHID||'-'||PAYEEACC) AS PAYACCOUNT ,NVL(PAYBANKID,'') AS PAYBANKID ,NVL(BRANCHID,'') AS BRANCHID ,NVL(PAYEEACC,'') AS PAYEEACC ,PAYSEQNO ,NLWKMK ,ADWKMK ,NACHGMK ,CPRNDATE FROM BAPAYRPTRECORD WHERE RPTTYP = '1' AND BENEVTREL NOT IN ('F','N','Z') AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND PAYSEQNO = #paySeqNo:VARCHAR# AND APNO LIKE #apNo:VARCHAR#||'%' AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR#
AND 1 = 0
(
NVL(TRIM(NACHGMK),' ') = ' '
NVL(TRIM(NACHGMK),' ') != ' '
OR TRIM(NACHGMK) IS NULL
OR TRIM(NACHGMK) IS NOT NULL
)
ORDER BY NACHGMK, NLWKMK, ADWKMK, ISSUTYP,PAYTYP,PAYYM,APNO,SEQNO

SELECT APNO ,PAYYM ,BENIDN ,BENNAME ,PAYTYP ,NVL(ISSUEAMT,0) AS ISSUEAMT ,NVL(OTHERAAMT,0) AS OTHERAAMT ,NVL(OTHERBAMT,0) AS OTHERBAMT ,NVL(MITRATE,0) AS MITRATE ,NVL(OFFSETAMT,0) AS OFFSETAMT ,NVL(COMPENAMT,0) AS COMPENAMT ,NVL(INHERITORAMT,0) AS INHERITORAMT ,NVL(ITRTTAX,0) AS ITRTTAX ,NVL(OTHERAMT,0) AS OTHERAMT ,ISSUTYP ,deCode(PAYTYP,'A',BENIDN,PAYBANKID||'-'||BRANCHID||'-'||PAYEEACC) AS PAYACCOUNT ,NVL(PAYBANKID,'') AS PAYBANKID ,NVL(BRANCHID,'') AS BRANCHID ,NVL(PAYEEACC,'') AS PAYEEACC ,NLWKMK ,ADWKMK ,NACHGMK ,CPRNDATE FROM BAPAYRPTRECORD WHERE RPTTYP = '1' AND BENEVTREL NOT IN ('F','N','Z') AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND APNO LIKE #apNo:VARCHAR#||'%' AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR#
AND 1 = 0
(
NVL(TRIM(NACHGMK),' ') = ' '
NVL(TRIM(NACHGMK),' ') != ' '
OR TRIM(NACHGMK) IS NULL
OR TRIM(NACHGMK) IS NOT NULL
)
ORDER BY PAYTYP, NLWKMK, ADWKMK, NACHGMK, APNO, PAYYM, SEQNO

SELECT APNO ,PAYYM ,BENIDN ,BENNAME ,PAYTYP ,CPRNDATE ,NVL(ISSUEAMT,0) AS ISSUEAMT ,NVL(OTHERAAMT,0) AS OTHERAAMT ,NVL(OTHERBAMT,0) AS OTHERBAMT ,NVL(MITRATE,0) AS MITRATE ,NVL(OFFSETAMT,0) AS OFFSETAMT ,NVL(COMPENAMT,0) AS COMPENAMT ,NVL(INHERITORAMT,0) AS INHERITORAMT ,NVL(ITRTTAX,0) AS ITRTTAX ,NVL(OTHERAMT,0) AS OTHERAMT ,ISSUTYP ,deCode(PAYTYP,'A',BENIDN,PAYBANKID||'-'||BRANCHID||'-'||PAYEEACC) AS PAYACCOUNT ,NVL(PAYBANKID,'') AS PAYBANKID ,NVL(BRANCHID,'') AS BRANCHID ,NVL(PAYEEACC,'') AS PAYEEACC ,SUBSTR(APNO, LENGTH(APNO), 1) AS APNOLASTDIGIT ,NVL(TRIM(NLWKMK), '') AS NLWKMK ,NVL(TRIM(ADWKMK), '') AS ADWKMK ,NACHGMK ,RPTROWS ,RPTPAGE FROM BAPAYRPTRECORD WHERE RPTTYP = '5' AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# AND APNO LIKE #apNo:VARCHAR#||'%' ORDER BY RPTPAGE, TO_NUMBER(RPTROWS), PAYTYP,APNOLASTDIGIT,PAYYM

SELECT APNO ,PAYYM ,BENIDN ,BENNAME ,PAYTYP ,CPRNDATE ,NVL(ISSUEAMT,0) AS ISSUEAMT ,NVL(OTHERAAMT,0) AS OTHERAAMT ,NVL(OTHERBAMT,0) AS OTHERBAMT ,NVL(MITRATE,0) AS MITRATE ,NVL(OFFSETAMT,0) AS OFFSETAMT ,NVL(COMPENAMT,0) AS COMPENAMT ,NVL(INHERITORAMT,0) AS INHERITORAMT ,NVL(ITRTTAX,0) AS ITRTTAX ,NVL(OTHERAMT,0) AS OTHERAMT ,ISSUTYP ,deCode(PAYTYP,'A',BENIDN,PAYBANKID||'-'||BRANCHID||'-'||PAYEEACC) AS PAYACCOUNT ,NVL(PAYBANKID,'') AS PAYBANKID ,NVL(BRANCHID,'') AS BRANCHID ,NVL(PAYEEACC,'') AS PAYEEACC ,NVL(TRIM(NLWKMK), '') AS NLWKMK ,NVL(TRIM(ADWKMK), '') AS ADWKMK ,NACHGMK ,RPTROWS ,RPTPAGE FROM BAPAYRPTRECORD WHERE RPTTYP = '6' AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND APNO LIKE #apNo:VARCHAR#||'%' AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# ORDER BY RPTPAGE, RPTROWS, ISSUTYP,PAYTYP,PAYYM

SELECT APNO ,PAYYM ,BENIDN ,BENNAME ,PAYTYP ,NVL(ISSUEAMT,0) AS ISSUEAMT ,NVL(OTHERAAMT,0) AS OTHERAAMT ,NVL(OTHERBAMT,0) AS OTHERBAMT ,NVL(MITRATE,0) AS MITRATE ,NVL(OFFSETAMT,0) AS OFFSETAMT ,NVL(COMPENAMT,0) AS COMPENAMT ,NVL(INHERITORAMT,0) AS INHERITORAMT ,NVL(ITRTTAX,0) AS ITRTTAX ,NVL(OTHERAMT,0) AS OTHERAMT ,ISSUTYP ,deCode(PAYTYP,'A',BENIDN,PAYBANKID||'-'||BRANCHID||'-'||PAYEEACC) AS PAYACCOUNT ,NVL(PAYBANKID,'') AS PAYBANKID ,NVL(BRANCHID,'') AS BRANCHID ,NVL(PAYEEACC,'') AS PAYEEACC ,NVL(TRIM(NLWKMK), '') AS NLWKMK ,NVL(TRIM(ADWKMK), '') AS ADWKMK ,NACHGMK ,CPRNDATE ,RPTROWS ,RPTPAGE FROM BAPAYRPTRECORD WHERE RPTTYP = '8' AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND APNO LIKE #apNo:VARCHAR#||'%' AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR#
AND 1 = 0
PAYSEQNO = #paySeqNo:VARCHAR#
(
NVL(TRIM(NACHGMK),' ') = ' '
NVL(TRIM(NACHGMK),' ') != ' '
OR TRIM(NACHGMK) IS NULL
OR TRIM(NACHGMK) IS NOT NULL
)
ORDER BY ISSUTYP, NLWKMK, ADWKMK, NACHGMK, APNO, PAYYM, SEQNO
ORDER BY RPTPAGE, RPTROWS, NACHGMK, NLWKMK, ADWKMK, ISSUTYP,PAYTYP,PAYYM

SELECT APNO, PAYYM, PAYDATE, BENNAME, BENIDN, NVL(ISSUEAMT, 0) AS ISSUEAMT, COMMTEL, OTHERAPNO1, OTHERSEQNO1, HJMK, ISSUTYP, PAYTYP, CPRNDATE, NVL(TRIM(NLWKMK), '') AS NLWKMK, NVL(TRIM(ADWKMK), '') AS ADWKMK, NACHGMK, deCode(DATAKD, '1', '1', '2', '1', '9', '2', 'B', '1', ' ') AS DATATYP, (SELECT PARAMNAME FROM BAPARAM WHERE PARAMGROUP = 'DATAKD' AND PARAMCODE = DATAKD ) AS DATAKD, (SELECT PARAMNAME FROM BAPARAM WHERE PARAMGROUP = 'BLIPAYEEACC' AND PARAMCODE = DATAKD ) AS BLIPAYEEACC FROM BAPAYRPTRECORD WHERE RPTTYP = '10' AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND SUBSTR(APNO, 1, 1) = #payCode:VARCHAR# AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# ORDER BY DATAKD, ISSUTYP, PAYTYP, APNO, OTHERAPNO1, PAYYM

SELECT APNO, PAYYM, PAYDATE, BENNAME, BENIDN, NVL(ISSUEAMT, 0) AS ISSUEAMT, COMMTEL, OTHERAPNO1, OTHERSEQNO1, HJMK, ISSUTYP, PAYTYP, CPRNDATE, NVL(TRIM(NLWKMK), '') AS NLWKMK, NVL(TRIM(ADWKMK), '') AS ADWKMK, NACHGMK, deCode(DATAKD, '1', '1', '2', '1', '9', '2', 'B', '1', ' ') AS DATATYP, (SELECT PARAMNAME FROM BAPARAM WHERE PARAMGROUP = 'DATAKD' AND PARAMCODE = DATAKD ) AS DATAKD, (SELECT PARAMNAME FROM BAPARAM WHERE PARAMGROUP = 'BLIPAYEEACC' AND PARAMCODE = DATAKD ) AS BLIPAYEEACC FROM BAPAYRPTRECORD WHERE RPTTYP = '10' AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND SUBSTR(APNO, 1, 1) = #payCode:VARCHAR# AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR#
AND 1 = 0
PAYSEQNO = #paySeqNo:VARCHAR#
ORDER BY DATAKD, ISSUTYP, PAYTYP, APNO, OTHERAPNO1, PAYYM

SELECT APNO, PAYYM, PAYDATE, BENNAME, BENIDN, NVL(ISSUEAMT, 0) AS ISSUEAMT, COMMTEL, OTHERAPNO1, OTHERSEQNO1, HJMK, ISSUTYP, PAYTYP, CPRNDATE, NVL(TRIM(NLWKMK), '') AS NLWKMK, NVL(TRIM(ADWKMK), '') AS ADWKMK, NACHGMK, deCode(DATAKD, '1', '1', '2', '1', '9', '2', 'B', '1', ' ') AS DATATYP, (SELECT PARAMNAME FROM BAPARAM WHERE PARAMGROUP = 'DATAKD' AND PARAMCODE = DATAKD ) AS DATAKD, (SELECT PARAMNAME FROM BAPARAM WHERE PARAMGROUP = 'BLIPAYEEACC' AND PARAMCODE = DATAKD ) AS BLIPAYEEACC FROM BAPAYRPTRECORD WHERE RPTTYP = '10' AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND SUBSTR(APNO, 1, 1) = #payCode:VARCHAR# AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# ORDER BY DATAKD, ISSUTYP, PAYTYP, APNO, OTHERAPNO1, PAYYM

SELECT OTHERAPNO1, PAYDATE, BENNAME, NVL(SUM(ISSUEAMT),0) AS ISSUEAMT, ISSUTYP, PAYTYP, CPRNDATE, NVL(TRIM(NLWKMK), '') AS NLWKMK, NVL(TRIM(ADWKMK), '') AS ADWKMK, NACHGMK FROM BAPAYRPTRECORD WHERE RPTTYP = '9' AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# AND SUBSTR(APNO, 1, 1) = #payCode:VARCHAR# AND DATAKD = '9' GROUP BY OTHERAPNO1, PAYDATE, BENNAME, ISSUTYP, PAYTYP, CPRNDATE, NLWKMK, ADWKMK, NACHGMK ORDER BY ISSUTYP, PAYTYP, OTHERAPNO1

SELECT OTHERAPNO1, PAYDATE, BENNAME, NVL(SUM(ISSUEAMT),0) AS ISSUEAMT, ISSUTYP, PAYTYP, CPRNDATE, NVL(TRIM(NLWKMK), '') AS NLWKMK, NVL(TRIM(ADWKMK), '') AS ADWKMK, NACHGMK FROM BAPAYRPTRECORD WHERE RPTTYP = '9' AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# AND SUBSTR(APNO, 1, 1) = #payCode:VARCHAR# AND DATAKD = '9'
AND 1 = 0
PAYSEQNO = #paySeqNo:VARCHAR#
GROUP BY OTHERAPNO1, PAYDATE, BENNAME, ISSUTYP, PAYTYP, CPRNDATE, NLWKMK, ADWKMK, NACHGMK ORDER BY ISSUTYP, PAYTYP, OTHERAPNO1

SELECT OTHERAPNO1, PAYDATE, BENNAME, NVL(SUM(ISSUEAMT),0) AS ISSUEAMT, ISSUTYP, PAYTYP, CPRNDATE, NVL(TRIM(NLWKMK), '') AS NLWKMK, NVL(TRIM(ADWKMK), '') AS ADWKMK, NACHGMK FROM BAPAYRPTRECORD WHERE RPTTYP = '9' AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# AND SUBSTR(APNO, 1, 1) = #payCode:VARCHAR# AND DATAKD = '9' GROUP BY OTHERAPNO1, PAYDATE, BENNAME, ISSUTYP, PAYTYP, CPRNDATE, NLWKMK, ADWKMK, NACHGMK ORDER BY ISSUTYP, PAYTYP, OTHERAPNO1

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT APNO) AS APNOAMT ,COUNT(*) AS DATAAMT ,NVL(SUM(ISSUEAMT),0) ISSUEAMT ,NVL(SUM(OTHERAAMT),0) OTHERAAMT ,NVL(SUM(OTHERBAMT),0) OTHERBAMT ,NVL(SUM(MITRATE),0) MITRATE ,NVL(SUM(OFFSETAMT),0) OFFSETAMT ,NVL(SUM(COMPENAMT),0) COMPENAMT ,NVL(SUM(INHERITORAMT),0) INHERITORAMT ,NVL(SUM(ITRTTAX),0) ITRTTAX ,NVL(SUM(OTHERAMT),0) OTHERAMT ,ISSUTYP ,PAYTYP ,CHKDATE FROM BAPAYRPTRECORD WHERE RPTTYP = '8' AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND APNO LIKE #payCode:VARCHAR#||'%' AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR#
AND ISSUTYP <> 'F'
GROUP BY PAYTYP,ISSUTYP,CHKDATE ORDER BY PAYTYP,ISSUTYP,CHKDATE

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT APNO) AS APNOAMT ,COUNT(*) AS DATAAMT ,NVL(SUM(ISSUEAMT),0) ISSUEAMT ,NVL(SUM(UNACPAMT),0) UNACPAMT ,CHKDATE FROM BAPAYRPTRECORD WHERE RPTTYP = '7' AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND APNO LIKE #payCode:VARCHAR#||'%' AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# GROUP BY PAYTYP,ISSUTYP,CHKDATE ORDER BY PAYTYP,ISSUTYP,CHKDATE

SELECT APNO ,SEQNO ,BENNAME ,ISSUYM ,PAYYM ,NVL(ISSUEAMT,0) AS ISSUEAMT ,NVL(UNACPAMT,0) AS UNACPAMT ,CHKDATE ,NVL(TRIM(NLWKMK), '') AS NLWKMK ,NVL(TRIM(ADWKMK), '') AS ADWKMK ,NACHGMK ,CPRNDATE ,RPTROWS ,RPTPAGE FROM BAPAYRPTRECORD WHERE RPTTYP = '7' AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND APNO LIKE #apNo:VARCHAR#||'%' AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR#
AND 1 = 0
PAYSEQNO = #paySeqNo:VARCHAR#
(
NVL(TRIM(NACHGMK),' ') = ' '
NVL(TRIM(NACHGMK),' ') != ' '
OR TRIM(NACHGMK) IS NULL
OR TRIM(NACHGMK) IS NOT NULL
)
ORDER BY NLWKMK, ADWKMK, NACHGMK, APNO, PAYYM, SEQNO
SELECT RPTTYP FROM BAPAYRPTRECORD WHERE ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# AND APNO LIKE #apNo:VARCHAR#||'%' GROUP BY RPTTYP ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(RPTTYP)

SELECT COUNT(*) AS DATACOUNT FROM BAPAYRPTRECORD WHERE ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# AND APNO LIKE #apNo:VARCHAR#||'%' AND RPTTYP = '3'
PAYTYP='4'
PAYTYP < '4'
PAYTYP <= '4'
PAYTYP = '4'
PAYTYP >= '4'
PAYTYP > '4'
PAYTYP != '4'

SELECT t1.APNO ,t1.ISSUYM ,t1.PAYYM ,nvl(trim(t1.ACCNAME),t3.ACCNAME) as ACCNAME ,t1.PAYAMT ,t2.COMMZIP ,t2.COMMADDR FROM BAPAYRPTRECORD t1,BAAPPBASE t2,BADAPR t3 WHERE t1.APNO = t2.APNO AND t1.SEQNO = t2.SEQNO AND t2.APNO = t3.APNO AND t2.SEQNO = t3.SEQNO AND t1.APNO = t3.APNO AND t1.SEQNO = t3.SEQNO AND t1.ISSUYM = t3.ISSUYM AND t1.PAYYM = t3.PAYYM AND t3.MTESTMK = 'F' AND t3.PAYKIND not in ('34','44','54') AND t1.RPTTYP = '3' AND t1.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND t1.CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# AND t1.APNO LIKE #apNo:VARCHAR#||'%' AND t1.PAYTYP = '4' ORDER BY t1.APNO,t1.SEQNO,t1.PAYYM

SELECT t1.APNO ,t1.ISSUYM ,t1.PAYYM ,nvl(trim(t1.ACCNAME),t3.ACCNAME) as ACCNAME ,t1.PAYAMT ,t2.COMMZIP ,t2.COMMADDR FROM BAPAYRPTRECORD t1,BAAPPBASE t2,BADAPR t3 WHERE t1.APNO = t2.APNO AND t1.SEQNO = t2.SEQNO AND t2.APNO = t3.APNO AND t2.SEQNO = t3.SEQNO AND t1.APNO = t3.APNO AND t1.SEQNO = t3.SEQNO AND t1.ISSUYM = t3.ISSUYM AND t1.PAYYM = t3.PAYYM AND t3.MTESTMK = 'F' AND t3.PAYKIND not in ('34','44','54') AND t1.RPTTYP = '3' AND t1.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND t1.CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# AND t1.APNO LIKE #apNo:VARCHAR#||'%' AND t1.PAYTYP = '4'
AND 1 = 0
t1.PAYSEQNO = #paySeqNo:VARCHAR#
ORDER BY t1.APNO,t1.SEQNO,t1.PAYYM

SELECT t1.APNO ,t1.ISSUYM ,t1.PAYYM ,nvl(trim(t1.ACCNAME),t3.ACCNAME) as ACCNAME ,t1.PAYAMT ,t2.COMMZIP ,t2.COMMADDR FROM BAPAYRPTRECORD t1,BAAPPBASE t2,BADAPR t3 WHERE t1.APNO = t2.APNO AND t1.SEQNO = t2.SEQNO AND t2.APNO = t3.APNO AND t2.SEQNO = t3.SEQNO AND t1.APNO = t3.APNO AND t1.SEQNO = t3.SEQNO AND t1.ISSUYM = t3.ISSUYM AND t1.PAYYM = t3.PAYYM AND t3.MTESTMK = 'F' AND t3.PAYKIND not in ('34','44','54') AND t1.RPTTYP = '3' AND t1.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND t1.CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# AND t1.APNO LIKE #apNo:VARCHAR#||'%' AND t1.PAYTYP = '4' ORDER BY t1.APNO,t1.SEQNO,t1.PAYYM

SELECT A.APNO, A.BENNAME, A.BENIDN, NVL(A.PAYAMT, 0) AS PAYAMT, A.ISSUYM, A.PAYYM, A.PAYDATE, A.COMPNAME2, A.COMPNAME1, A.PAYTYP, A.PAYBANKID, A.BRANCHID, A.PAYEEACC, A.CPRNDATE FROM BAPAYRPTRECORD A WHERE A.RPTTYP = '11' AND A.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# AND SUBSTR(A.APNO, 1, 1) = #payCode:VARCHAR# ORDER BY A.PAYTYP, A.COMPNAME1, A.PAYBANKID, A.BRANCHID, A.PAYEEACC, A.APNO, A.SEQNO

SELECT COMPNAME1, NVL(SUM(PAYAMT),0) AS PAYAMT, PAYTYP, PAYBANKID, BRANCHID, PAYEEACC FROM BAPAYRPTRECORD WHERE RPTTYP = '11' AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# AND SUBSTR(APNO, 1, 1) = #payCode:VARCHAR# GROUP BY PAYTYP, COMPNAME1, PAYBANKID, BRANCHID, PAYEEACC

PAYSEQNO = #paySeqNo:VARCHAR#
ORDER BY RPTPAGE, RPTROWS, NACHGMK, NLWKMK, ADWKMK, ISSUTYP,PAYTYP,PAYYM

SELECT APNO ,PAYYM ,ISSUYM ,BENIDN ,BENNAME ,PAYTYP ,CPRNDATE ,NVL(ISSUEAMT,0) AS ISSUEAMT ,NVL(OTHERAAMT,0) AS OTHERAAMT ,NVL(OTHERBAMT,0) AS OTHERBAMT ,NVL(MITRATE,0) AS MITRATE ,NVL(OFFSETAMT,0) AS OFFSETAMT ,NVL(COMPENAMT,0) AS COMPENAMT ,NVL(INHERITORAMT,0) AS INHERITORAMT ,NVL(ITRTTAX,0) AS ITRTTAX ,NVL(OTHERAMT,0) AS OTHERAMT ,ISSUTYP ,deCode(PAYTYP,'A',BENIDN,PAYBANKID||'-'||BRANCHID||'-'||PAYEEACC) AS PAYACCOUNT ,NVL(PAYBANKID,'') AS PAYBANKID ,NVL(BRANCHID,'') AS BRANCHID ,NVL(PAYEEACC,'') AS PAYEEACC ,NVL(TRIM(NLWKMK), '') AS NLWKMK ,NVL(TRIM(ADWKMK), '') AS ADWKMK ,NACHGMK ,RPTROWS ,RPTPAGE FROM BAPAYRPTRECORD WHERE RPTTYP = #rptTyp:VARCHAR# AND APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR#

ORDER BY RPTPAGE, RPTROWS, NACHGMK, NLWKMK, ADWKMK, ISSUTYP,PAYTYP,PAYYM

SELECT APNO ,PAYYM ,BENIDN ,BENNAME ,PAYTYP ,NVL(ISSUEAMT,0) AS ISSUEAMT ,NVL(OTHERAAMT,0) AS OTHERAAMT ,NVL(OTHERBAMT,0) AS OTHERBAMT ,NVL(MITRATE,0) AS MITRATE ,NVL(OFFSETAMT,0) AS OFFSETAMT ,NVL(COMPENAMT,0) AS COMPENAMT ,NVL(INHERITORAMT,0) AS INHERITORAMT ,NVL(ITRTTAX,0) AS ITRTTAX ,NVL(OTHERAMT,0) AS OTHERAMT ,ISSUTYP ,deCode(PAYTYP,'A',BENIDN,PAYBANKID||'-'||BRANCHID||'-'||PAYEEACC) AS PAYACCOUNT ,NVL(PAYBANKID,'') AS PAYBANKID ,NVL(BRANCHID,'') AS BRANCHID ,NVL(PAYEEACC,'') AS PAYEEACC ,NVL(TRIM(NLWKMK), '') AS NLWKMK ,NVL(TRIM(ADWKMK), '') AS ADWKMK ,NACHGMK ,CPRNDATE ,RPTROWS ,RPTPAGE ,EVTNAME FROM BAPAYRPTRECORD WHERE RPTTYP = '19' AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND APNO LIKE #apNo:VARCHAR#||'%' AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR#

sqlMap.insert: insert into BAPAYRPTRECORD ( RPTTYP ,CPRNDATE ,PAYDATE ,CHKDATE ,APNO ,SEQNO ,PAYCODE ,PAYKIND ,ISSUTYP ,ISSUYM ,PAYYM ,BENIDS ,BENIDN ,BENNAME ,PAYBANKID ,BRANCHID ,PAYEEACC ,ISSUEAMT ,PROCTIME ,PAYSEQNO ,NLWKMK ,ADWKMK ,NACHGMK ,CASETYP ,PAYTYP ,STS ) values ( '18' ,to_Char(Sysdate,'YYYYMMDD') ,#payDate:VARCHAR# ,#chkDate:VARCHAR# ,#apNo:VARCHAR# ,#seqNo:VARCHAR# ,#payCode:VARCHAR# ,#payKind:VARCHAR# ,#issuTyp:VARCHAR# ,#issuYm:VARCHAR# ,#payYm:VARCHAR# ,#benIds:VARCHAR# ,#benIdn:VARCHAR# ,#benName:VARCHAR# ,#payBankId:VARCHAR# ,#branchId:VARCHAR# ,#payEeacc:VARCHAR# ,#issueAmt:NUMERIC# , to_Char(Sysdate,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') ,'' ,#nlWkMk:VARCHAR# ,#adWkMk:VARCHAR# ,#naChgMk:VARCHAR# ,#caseTyp:VARCHAR# ,#payTyp:VARCHAR# ,#sts:VARCHAR# )

insert into BAPAYRPTRECORD ( RPTTYP ,CPRNDATE ,PAYDATE ,CHKDATE ,APNO ,SEQNO ,PAYCODE ,PAYKIND ,ISSUTYP ,ISSUYM ,PAYYM ,BENIDS ,BENIDN ,BENNAME ,PAYBANKID ,BRANCHID ,PAYEEACC ,ISSUEAMT ,PROCTIME ,PAYSEQNO ,NLWKMK ,ADWKMK ,NACHGMK ,CASETYP ,PAYTYP ,STS ) values ( '18' ,to_Char(Sysdate,'YYYYMMDD') ,#payDate:VARCHAR# ,#chkDate:VARCHAR# ,#apNo:VARCHAR# ,#seqNo:VARCHAR# ,#payCode:VARCHAR# ,#payKind:VARCHAR# ,#issuTyp:VARCHAR# ,#issuYm:VARCHAR# ,#payYm:VARCHAR# ,#benIds:VARCHAR# ,#benIdn:VARCHAR# ,#benName:VARCHAR# ,#payBankId:VARCHAR# ,#branchId:VARCHAR# ,#payEeacc:VARCHAR# ,#issueAmt:NUMERIC# , to_Char(Sysdate,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') ,'' ,#nlWkMk:VARCHAR# ,#adWkMk:VARCHAR# ,#naChgMk:VARCHAR# ,#caseTyp:VARCHAR# ,#payTyp:VARCHAR# ,#sts:VARCHAR# )
sqlMap.select: SELECT APNOAMT, DATAAMT, ISSUEAMT, OTHERAAMT, OTHERBAMT, MITRATE, OFFSETAMT, COMPENAMT, INHERITORAMT, ITRTTAX, OTHERAMT, ISSUTYP, CHKDATE, CPRNDATE, RPTTYP, (ISSUEAMT - OTHERAAMT - OTHERBAMT - MITRATE - OFFSETAMT - COMPENAMT - INHERITORAMT - ITRTTAX - OTHERAMT) AS PAYAMT, ISSUYM, CASETYP, PAYTYP, NLWKMK, ADWKMK, NACHGMK, STS, APNO, SEQNO FROM (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT APNO) AS APNOAMT ,COUNT(*) AS DATAAMT ,NVL(SUM(ISSUEAMT),0) AS ISSUEAMT ,NVL(SUM(OTHERAAMT),0) AS OTHERAAMT ,NVL(SUM(OTHERBAMT),0) AS OTHERBAMT ,NVL(SUM(MITRATE),0) AS MITRATE ,NVL(SUM(OFFSETAMT),0) AS OFFSETAMT ,NVL(SUM(COMPENAMT),0) AS COMPENAMT ,NVL(SUM(INHERITORAMT),0) AS INHERITORAMT ,NVL(SUM(ITRTTAX),0) AS ITRTTAX ,NVL(SUM(OTHERAMT),0) AS OTHERAMT ,ISSUTYP ,CHKDATE ,CPRNDATE ,RPTTYP ,ISSUYM ,CASETYP ,PAYTYP ,NLWKMK ,ADWKMK ,NACHGMK ,STS ,APNO ,SEQNO FROM BAPAYRPTRECORD WHERE RPTTYP = '18' AND APNO LIKE (#payCode:VARCHAR# || '%') AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# AND ISSUTYP IN ('G') GROUP BY PAYTYP,CASETYP, APNO, SEQNO, NACHGMK, NLWKMK, ADWKMK,ISSUTYP,ISSUYM, CHKDATE, CPRNDATE, RPTTYP,STS ORDER BY PAYTYP,CASETYP,NACHGMK, NLWKMK, ADWKMK,ISSUTYP,ISSUYM, CHKDATE, CPRNDATE, RPTTYP,STS)

SELECT APNOAMT, DATAAMT, ISSUEAMT, OTHERAAMT, OTHERBAMT, MITRATE, OFFSETAMT, COMPENAMT, INHERITORAMT, ITRTTAX, OTHERAMT, ISSUTYP, CHKDATE, CPRNDATE, RPTTYP, (ISSUEAMT - OTHERAAMT - OTHERBAMT - MITRATE - OFFSETAMT - COMPENAMT - INHERITORAMT - ITRTTAX - OTHERAMT) AS PAYAMT, ISSUYM, CASETYP, PAYTYP, NLWKMK, ADWKMK, NACHGMK, STS, APNO, SEQNO FROM (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT APNO) AS APNOAMT ,COUNT(*) AS DATAAMT ,NVL(SUM(ISSUEAMT),0) AS ISSUEAMT ,NVL(SUM(OTHERAAMT),0) AS OTHERAAMT ,NVL(SUM(OTHERBAMT),0) AS OTHERBAMT ,NVL(SUM(MITRATE),0) AS MITRATE ,NVL(SUM(OFFSETAMT),0) AS OFFSETAMT ,NVL(SUM(COMPENAMT),0) AS COMPENAMT ,NVL(SUM(INHERITORAMT),0) AS INHERITORAMT ,NVL(SUM(ITRTTAX),0) AS ITRTTAX ,NVL(SUM(OTHERAMT),0) AS OTHERAMT ,ISSUTYP ,CHKDATE ,CPRNDATE ,RPTTYP ,ISSUYM ,CASETYP ,PAYTYP ,NLWKMK ,ADWKMK ,NACHGMK ,STS ,APNO ,SEQNO FROM BAPAYRPTRECORD WHERE RPTTYP = '18' AND APNO LIKE (#payCode:VARCHAR# || '%') AND APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND ISSUTYP IN ('E') AND RPTROWS = 'N' GROUP BY PAYTYP,CASETYP, APNO, SEQNO, NACHGMK, NLWKMK, ADWKMK,ISSUTYP,ISSUYM, CHKDATE, CPRNDATE, RPTTYP,STS ORDER BY PAYTYP,CASETYP,NACHGMK, NLWKMK, ADWKMK,ISSUTYP,ISSUYM, CHKDATE, CPRNDATE, RPTTYP,STS)

SELECT APNOAMT, DATAAMT, ISSUEAMT, OTHERAAMT, OTHERBAMT, MITRATE, OFFSETAMT, COMPENAMT, INHERITORAMT, ITRTTAX, OTHERAMT, ISSUTYP, CHKDATE, CPRNDATE, RPTTYP, (ISSUEAMT - OTHERAAMT - OTHERBAMT - MITRATE - OFFSETAMT - COMPENAMT - INHERITORAMT - ITRTTAX - OTHERAMT) AS PAYAMT, ISSUYM, CASETYP, PAYTYP, NLWKMK, ADWKMK, NACHGMK, STS, APNO, SEQNO FROM (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT APNO) AS APNOAMT ,COUNT(*) AS DATAAMT ,NVL(SUM(ISSUEAMT),0) AS ISSUEAMT ,NVL(SUM(OTHERAAMT),0) AS OTHERAAMT ,NVL(SUM(OTHERBAMT),0) AS OTHERBAMT ,NVL(SUM(MITRATE),0) AS MITRATE ,NVL(SUM(OFFSETAMT),0) AS OFFSETAMT ,NVL(SUM(COMPENAMT),0) AS COMPENAMT ,NVL(SUM(INHERITORAMT),0) AS INHERITORAMT ,NVL(SUM(ITRTTAX),0) AS ITRTTAX ,NVL(SUM(OTHERAMT),0) AS OTHERAMT ,ISSUTYP ,CHKDATE ,NLWKMK ,ADWKMK ,NACHGMK ,CPRNDATE ,RPTTYP ,ISSUYM ,CASETYP ,PAYTYP ,STS ,APNO ,SEQNO FROM BAPAYRPTRECORD WHERE RPTTYP = '18' AND APNO LIKE (#payCode:VARCHAR# || '%') AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# AND ISSUTYP IN ('G') GROUP BY PAYTYP,CASETYP,ISSUTYP,ISSUYM, APNO, SEQNO, CHKDATE, NLWKMK, ADWKMK, NACHGMK, CPRNDATE, RPTTYP, STS ORDER BY PAYTYP,CASETYP,ISSUTYP,ISSUYM, CHKDATE, NLWKMK, ADWKMK, NACHGMK, CPRNDATE, RPTTYP, STS)

SELECT APNOAMT, DATAAMT, ISSUEAMT, OTHERAAMT, OTHERBAMT, MITRATE, OFFSETAMT, COMPENAMT, INHERITORAMT, ITRTTAX, OTHERAMT, ISSUTYP, CHKDATE, CPRNDATE, RPTTYP, (ISSUEAMT - OTHERAAMT - OTHERBAMT - MITRATE - OFFSETAMT - COMPENAMT - INHERITORAMT - ITRTTAX - OTHERAMT) AS PAYAMT, ISSUYM, CASETYP, PAYTYP, NLWKMK, ADWKMK, NACHGMK, STS, APNO, SEQNO FROM (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT APNO) AS APNOAMT ,COUNT(*) AS DATAAMT ,NVL(SUM(ISSUEAMT),0) AS ISSUEAMT ,NVL(SUM(OTHERAAMT),0) AS OTHERAAMT ,NVL(SUM(OTHERBAMT),0) AS OTHERBAMT ,NVL(SUM(MITRATE),0) AS MITRATE ,NVL(SUM(OFFSETAMT),0) AS OFFSETAMT ,NVL(SUM(COMPENAMT),0) AS COMPENAMT ,NVL(SUM(INHERITORAMT),0) AS INHERITORAMT ,NVL(SUM(ITRTTAX),0) AS ITRTTAX ,NVL(SUM(OTHERAMT),0) AS OTHERAMT ,ISSUTYP ,CHKDATE ,NLWKMK ,ADWKMK ,NACHGMK ,CPRNDATE ,RPTTYP ,ISSUYM ,CASETYP ,PAYTYP ,STS ,APNO ,SEQNO FROM BAPAYRPTRECORD WHERE RPTTYP = '18' AND APNO LIKE (#payCode:VARCHAR# || '%') AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# AND ISSUTYP IN ('G') GROUP BY PAYTYP,CASETYP,ISSUTYP,ISSUYM, APNO, SEQNO, CHKDATE, NLWKMK, ADWKMK, NACHGMK, CPRNDATE, RPTTYP, STS ORDER BY PAYTYP,CASETYP,ISSUTYP,ISSUYM, CHKDATE, NLWKMK, ADWKMK, NACHGMK, CPRNDATE, RPTTYP, STS)

SELECT APNO ,PAYYM ,ISSUYM ,BENIDN ,BENNAME ,PAYTYP ,CPRNDATE ,NVL(ISSUEAMT,0) AS ISSUEAMT ,NVL(OTHERAAMT,0) AS OTHERAAMT ,NVL(OTHERBAMT,0) AS OTHERBAMT ,NVL(MITRATE,0) AS MITRATE ,NVL(OFFSETAMT,0) AS OFFSETAMT ,NVL(COMPENAMT,0) AS COMPENAMT ,NVL(INHERITORAMT,0) AS INHERITORAMT ,NVL(ITRTTAX,0) AS ITRTTAX ,NVL(OTHERAMT,0) AS OTHERAMT ,ISSUTYP ,deCode(PAYTYP,'A',BENIDN,PAYBANKID||'-'||BRANCHID||'-'||PAYEEACC) AS PAYACCOUNT ,NVL(PAYBANKID,'') AS PAYBANKID ,NVL(BRANCHID,'') AS BRANCHID ,NVL(PAYEEACC,'') AS PAYEEACC ,NVL(TRIM(NLWKMK), '') AS NLWKMK ,NVL(TRIM(ADWKMK), '') AS ADWKMK ,NACHGMK ,RPTROWS ,RPTPAGE ,SUBSTR(APNO, LENGTH(APNO), 1) AS APNOLASTDIGIT FROM BAPAYRPTRECORD WHERE RPTTYP = #rptTyp:VARCHAR# AND APNO like (#payCode:VARCHAR# || '%') AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR#
AND 1 = 0
(
NVL(TRIM(NACHGMK),' ') = ' '
NVL(TRIM(NACHGMK),' ') != ' '
OR TRIM(NACHGMK) IS NULL
OR TRIM(NACHGMK) IS NOT NULL
)
ORDER BY RPTPAGE, RPTROWS, ISSUYM, NACHGMK, NLWKMK, ADWKMK, ISSUTYP, PAYTYP, PAYYM

SELECT NVL(SUM(Decode(PAYKIND,'37',0,ISSUEAMT)), 0) AS ISSUEAMTA, NVL(SUM(Decode(PAYKIND,'37',ISSUEAMT,0)), 0) AS ISSUEAMTB, NVL(SUM(Decode(PAYKIND,'37',0,ISSUEAMT)), 0) AS PAYAMTA, NVL(SUM(Decode(PAYKIND,'37',ISSUEAMT,0)), 0) AS PAYAMTB, NLWKMK, ADWKMK, NACHGMK, NVL(COUNT(*), 0) AS DATAAMT, CHKDATE, ISSUTYP, RPTTYP, CPRNDATE, ISSUYM, PAYTYP, STS, APNO, SEQNO AS APSEQNO FROM BAPAYRPTRECORD WHERE RPTTYP = '18' AND PAYCODE = #payCode:VARCHAR# AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# AND ISSUTYP IN ('G') GROUP BY PAYTYP,ISSUTYP,ISSUYM, APNO, SEQNO, CHKDATE, NLWKMK, ADWKMK, NACHGMK, CPRNDATE, RPTTYP, STS ORDER BY ISSUTYP,CHKDATE, NLWKMK, ADWKMK, NACHGMK
sqlMap.update: update BAPAYRPTRECORD t set t.RPTPAGE = #v_cprnpage:VARCHAR#, t.RPTROWS = #v_lcnt:VARCHAR#, t.PROCTIME = to_Char(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') where t.RPTTYP = '18' and t.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# and t.SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR# and t.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# and t.PAYYM = #payYm:VARCHAR# and t.CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# and (t.RPTPAGE is null or NVL(trim(t.RPTPAGE), ' ') = ' ' or NVL(trim(t.RPTPAGE), 0) = 0) and t.ISSUTYP = #issuTyp:VARCHAR#

update BAPAYRPTRECORD t set t.RPTPAGE = #v_cprnpage:VARCHAR#, t.RPTROWS = #v_lcnt:VARCHAR#, t.PROCTIME = to_Char(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') where t.RPTTYP = '18' and t.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# and t.SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR# and t.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# and t.PAYYM = #payYm:VARCHAR# and t.CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# and NVL(t.NLWKMK,' ') = NVL(#nlWkMk:VARCHAR#,' ') and NVL(t.ADWKMK,' ') = NVL(#adWkMk:VARCHAR#,' ') and t.NACHGMK is null and (t.RPTPAGE is null or NVL(trim(t.RPTPAGE), ' ') = ' ' or NVL(trim(t.RPTPAGE), 0) = 0) and t.ISSUTYP = #issuTyp:VARCHAR#

update BAPAYRPTRECORD t set t.RPTPAGE = #v_cprnpage:VARCHAR#, t.RPTROWS = #v_lcnt:VARCHAR#, t.PROCTIME = to_Char(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') where t.RPTTYP = '18' and t.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# and t.SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR# and t.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# and t.PAYYM = #payYm:VARCHAR# and t.CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# and NVL(t.NLWKMK,' ') = NVL(#nlWkMk:VARCHAR#,' ') and NVL(t.ADWKMK,' ') = NVL(#adWkMk:VARCHAR#,' ') and t.NACHGMK is null and (t.RPTPAGE is null or NVL(trim(t.RPTPAGE), ' ') = ' ' or NVL(trim(t.RPTPAGE), 0) = 0) and t.ISSUTYP = #issuTyp:VARCHAR#
UPDATE BAPAYRPTRECORD t SET t.RPTROWS = '' WHERE t.RPTTYP = '18' AND t.PAYCODE = #payCode:VARCHAR# AND t.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND t.ISSUTYP = 'E' AND t.RPTROWS = 'N'
